abstract: Catholic Big Brothers and Big Sisters and Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of eight agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, help Arlene Gratereaux and her daughter Andie manage transition to new city after fleeing abusive husband in Virginia.

keywords.value: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Being uprooted from her home amid domestic violence did not stop Andie Gratereaux, 12, from crossing things off her to-do list with a mentor’s help.
snippet: Being uprooted from her home amid domestic violence did not stop Andie Gratereaux, 12, from crossing things off her to-do list with a mentor’s help....

headline.main: Chipping Away at a List of Goals, and Bonding Over Cupcakes
headline.print_headline: Chipping Away at a List of Goals, and Bonding Over Cupcakes
